messages.content: 질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가
{문제}와 {문제에 대한 대답 스크립트} 입력
문제에 대한 대답 스크립트가 올바른 문맥을 가지고 있는지 문맥 적합도를 {낮음, 중간, 높음}으로 평가
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{You indicated that you live in an apartment. Please describe your house to me. What does it look like? How many rooms does it have? Tell me in detail.}, {Oh, my home. I live in a normal-looking apartment in Seoul. The capital city of Korea. My apartment is standard. There are three rooms, two bathrooms, a kitchen, also I have a balcony. You know, the best place in my apartment is the bedroom. That is the place where I spend most of my time. The bedroom is so spacious than other apartments. There is a queen-size bed and an excellent light. I usually spend my time on the bed with my smartphone. It is so comfortable. I think I am satisfied with my apartment.}
높음
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{You indicated in the survey that you enjoy shopping. Tell me about stores or shopping centers in your country. What are they like? Where are they located? What items do they sell? Is there a particular store that you regularly visit for shopping?}와 {Sorry, I didn't understand. Can we move on to the next question, please} 입력
낮음
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{You encounter an issue with the fitness equipment you recently purchased. Call the store and explain the problem. Suggest two or three alternative solutions to ensure you can start your fitness routine.}와 {I'm a member of KakaoG, this KakaoG. I'm nervous to, the refund. I stopped exercising for a month. I have some questions about refund. First of all, I was wondering, would it be possible to get a refund? If I can get a refund, I suspend, for a month.} 입력
중간
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{When you go to the movies, who do you usually go with? Are there any reasons you go to the movies with that person? What do you do with that person before going to a movie theater and after watching the movie?}, {I can't remember anything right now. Sorry, Ava. Let me go on to the next question}
낮음
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{Can you tell me about your bedroom? What does it look like and what do you keep in it? Please describe your bedroom in detail.}, {So, my bedroom is right in front of the door, the house door. And, when you come in through the front door of my house, you can see directly to my bedroom. So when you open it, you see around Five meters squared by five meters squared size room. And right to your left, you can see a bed with a gray futon on it. And, right to your right, you see a desktop computers with two monitors, placed right on top of my large desk. And there’s a balcony right connected to my room and we use it as. We use it to place some gadgets and unnecessary stuffs that we don’t use for this current season.}
중간
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{I'd like to give you a situation and ask you to act it out. You want to watch a movie with your friend. Call a theater and ask 3 or 4 questions to get the information you need to purchase tickets.}, {Hello, I'm interested in buying two tickets for the upcoming movie. So I have some questions. First, can you tell me what's the price range for the tickets? Um.... okay. And can I buy the tickets online? Oh, That's great. And um... do you offer any special discounts, by any chance? That's so nice, If I decide to purchase them online, can I pay by credit card? Yeah, I have a MasterCard. Um... If I buy them online, How will I receive the tickets and show them at the entrance? Alright, I got it. That's all the questions I have for now. Thank you so much.}
높음
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{Take me back to the last time you visited a park. Share details about that particular day, your experiences during your time at the park, and any memorable moments. How did the visit impact you?}, {I actually visited the park quite long ago, even though it’s only 10 minutes walk from my house. When I visited there, I grabbed a coffee from a coffee shop. And, it was a. evening. It was my day off. And I just walked around looking at people, just watching people having fun. And I was able to see a lot of families, including, young kids with their, with his or her parents. It was really nice to see them because they were having a real fun. It was really calming to, have that nature around me with, my favorite coffee and the kids I like.}
높음
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{People talk on the phone with family or friends. Who do you usually talk with on the phone most often? What do you normally talk about? Describe it in detail.}, {Oh, I went to Jeju Island last week with my British friend, Jordan. We had an unforgettable dinner time. Let me tell you what happened. Well... Jeju Island is well-known for horses. I mean the animal horses. Jordan and I drove all around Jeju Island, and we saw a lot of horses. We were so excited. We took pictures with the horses and rode on a super big horse. When we saw that, we were so surprised because the horse was very tall and quite big. We had a very fun time with them, but the dinner menu was..... you know, actually, we went to a horse restaurant. Yeah, I know, we were bad. Jordan wasn't able to eat any dishes. We just talked about what we were happy with them. A few moments later, our stomach was growling, so we ended up eating them. To be honest, they were great. It was just so delicious. I can't forget the dinner.}
낮음
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{Talk about one of the movies you watched as a child. What was it? How has your taste in movies changed over the years? How are the movies you enjoy now different from those in the past?}, {I remember when I was 7 years old, I heard some truly amazing music for the first time. It was in a movie called 'The Pianist' , which told the story of a talented pianist. The piano music in the movie was so powerful and moving, and it really touched my heart. Unfortunately, I don't remember the name of the piano music. However, I'm into K-pop music nowadays. And I love going to concerts, especially for popular groups like BTS, Aespa, and Blackpink. K-pop concerts are such a big trend in Korea right now. I still like piano music these days, but I mostly listen to K-pop songs.}
낮음
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{What are the causes of the housing shortage in your community? Tell me some issues that people talk about related to the housing shortage.}, {About the housing shortage, The Korea has some obvious reasons why the house shortage is occurring. So, do you know about how Korean stock market is doing. So, when you think about the U.S., they just invest in the stock market. But in Korea, the CEOs in most of the companies, they just, imagine, I am the CEO, and I have a son, and I just give this company's CEO to him. So the CEO shouldn't, don't have to think about the stockholders because they have the most of it. And so the many of the, so the most of the people have to invest the money. They just invest on some housings. Because they stand still and they don't have the owner risk. So the 20s or 30s or other ages of people who are called the MZ generations, I cannot buy the housing. And especially in Korea, they are so centralized in Seoul or just Busan, I guess. So the housing shortages are just occurring right now.}
중간
질문에 대한 대답 스크립트가 입력되었을 때 문맥이 적합한지 평가

{What is your routine when you go to the auditorium? What do you do before the concert and after? Please describe your routine in as much detail as possible.}, {Sorry, I don't understand you. Can we move on next question?}
낮음
